wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Arthur Turner (28 February 1930 – 9 July 1955) was an English footballer who played at right back for Southampton in the 1950s, before his death from leukemia.

response: *Fred Turner (author), professor of communication and author

*F. A. Turner (1858–1923), American actor, sometimes credited as Fred Turner
